1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure

Set against the backdrop of the Old World, two adventurers--both seasoned
warriors--will quest across a Western Europe ablaze with the turmoil of a
newly begun Fourth Crusade. Denz, a holy Templar, and Esteban, a roguish
mercenary, may have different origins, but their motivations are the same
amidst the danger and despair of a new Crusade, to find the means to deliver
themselves from a terrible curse that threatens to consume their immortal
souls.

I downloaded the game earlier today at a pretty good speed and this is how my play through went:

- Watch intro for 2-3 minutes get bored as hell and skip
- Skip another 3 or 4 boring cutscenes
- Game actually starts now
- Fighting 3 guys, I try to hit 1 but the character reaction is so slow i get hit in the face 2 times by the same guy before I get a hit
- Decide this is enough and exit the game
- Uninstall the game, want my wasted time back.

I can't tell you how good the game actually is but the first 5 minutes made a very bad impression on me and I don't usually quit games I don't like, so fast.

I get the game to work fine but I cant clear the first stage! It's where you are being hunted by the death god and u have to press the arrows accordingly... The thing is it doesnt work:S! What am I doing wrong here?!

At the arrow prompts, you have to wait for the outer circle to reach the inner white circle, then press the indicated direction. 

But you really shouldn't bother with this game - I don't think I have seen another game that is more awkwardly controlled, horrible-looking and just all around atrocious in the past decade. Oh, and it's not even a game, it's just a convoluted and boring interactive movie with occasional fights to break the monotony.
well i waited this game and i hope i wont be disappointed

FUCKING SHIT!  Do not download this.  The RELOADED Version is shit.  The crack is shit.  The max the seeings will go to is 1080p at 30Hz!  OMG!  I am usually one to never complain but, OMG!  Never through I would see a bad upload by extremezone, but it is not his fault.  But still appreciated for the upload.  I don't think I will try the "Lossless Black Box" because for one, Lossless would mean that the file size should be way bigger.  You should know extremzone, you upload a lot of movies.  Lossless means that the original data and quality be exactly the same as after encoding the video using a lossless setting.  The Black Box should be Lossy.  That is another term for encoding shit.

go to the game directory TCC.exe
properties, set compatibility to xp sp 2
and check run program as administrator.
It will now save!
